dcterms:creator: L. Deng
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset contains 10 different classes of handwritten digits from ‘0’ to ‘9’. It is widely used for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: Fashion-MNIST is a collection of 10 different shapes of clothing items such as t-shirts, dresses, and shoes. It serves as a drop-in replacement for the MNIST dataset for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST
